Html:
We Need Call centre to sell PC support services  (this is service provided by a client through us)

 

1.You will be paid $800 per staff or seat dialing for COMPANY.

2. Each agent would endeavor to make at least 4 sales per day, in case this minimum is not achieve you are free to use additional staffing or overtime at your own cost to achieve the targets set.

Contact-admin@eshreya.com
